column5: I am looking to get some window tinting done in the Hamilton / Burlington area (or close by), if the they do 3M Paint Protection Film would be good too....  Anyone recommend somebody with good warranty etc.????  Burt
you can try canada autoglass in burlington, its where we send all our glass work.
Ziebart Tidy Car on Plains Rd. Lifetime warranty on the tint and they do it right the first time.
Thanks guys, I'll check these places out.  Burt
Nice, glad you posted this Burtess so I didn't have to. Looking to get front windows done. I might even splurge and get the back done darker.
